content.title: Gorham-Stout Disease (Vanishing Bone Disease)
content.description: Rare disorder with progressive osteolysis associated with lymphatic or vascular proliferation within bone.

vascular_component.pathology: Lymphatic or vascular channels replace bone
vascular_component.chylous_effusions: May develop chylothorax or chylous ascites

treatment.chylothorax: May require thoracic duct ligation or embolization

content.clinical_pearl: Chylothorax in setting of bone destruction should raise suspicion for Gorham-Stout
